name: Cell Nuclei Segmentation
title: Cell Nuclei Segmentaion using U-net
description: Segments cell nuclei using U-Net in Tensorflow. Neural net architecture and pretrained weights are taken from Data Science Bowl 2018 entry by Muhammad Asim
author: Gauhar Bains (gauhar.bains@labshare.org), Konstantin Taletskiy (Konstantin.Taletskiy@labshare.org)
institution: National Center for Advancing Translational Sciences, National Institutes of Health
citation: For neural network architecture and pretrained weights : https://github.com/axium/Data-Science-Bowl-2018

inputs.name: inpDir
inputs.description: Input Image Collection for the plugin.

outputs.name: outDir
outputs.description: Output Image Collection for the plugin.
